alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 3:10AM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches for valley locations such as Susanville, and 4 to 10 inches generally west of US-395. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph, with gusts up to 65 mph in wind prone areas such as US-395. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. Very cold temperatures settling in Wednesday night may prolong travel issues into Thursday morning. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be found by checking with CalTrans.
